sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Teacher</radical>s are all around us. Those who came before us are our teachers, so it's important to respect them. This is the basic idea of <kanji>filial piety</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Respect your elders, for they have much to teach us.
readingMnemonic: With <kanji>filial piety</kanji> in mind, you decide to go visit your father, who is <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>.
readingInfo: I am so ignorant and have much to learn. I must show filial piety to my father, <ja>こういち</ja>, so that he may teach me.
